Sage.Entity.Interfaces.IAccount current = BindingSource.Current as Sage.Entity.Interfaces.IAccount;
txtAccountInfo.Text = current.AccountName + "
" +
	current.Address.Address1 + "
" +
	current.Address.Address2 + "
" + 
    current.Address.Address3 + "
" +
	current.Address.CityStatePostal + "
" +
	(!string.IsNullOrEmpty(current.Address.Country) ? current.Address.Country + "
" : "") +
	current.MainPhone + "
" +
	current.Fax + "
";

while (txtAccountInfo.Text.Contains("

"))
	txtAccountInfo.Text = txtAccountInfo.Text.Replace("

", "
");
